[00:00.00]Hold On - Justin Bieber (贾斯汀·比伯)
[00:02.64]Lyrics by：Louis Bell/Justin Bieber/Andrew Wotman/Alexandra Tamposi/Jonathan Bellion/Luiz Bonfa/Walter De Backer
[00:05.28]Composed by：Louis Bell/Justin Bieber/Andrew Wotman/Alexandra Tamposi/Jonathan Bellion/Luiz Bonfa/Walter De Backer
[00:07.93]You know you can call me if you need someone
[00:11.48]
[00:14.71]I'll pick up the pieces if you come undone
[00:18.24]
[00:20.99]Painting stars up on your ceiling
[00:23.83]Cause you wish that you could find some feeling yeah you
[00:27.72]
[00:28.38]You know you can call me if you need someone
[00:32.28]
[00:33.85]I need you to hold on
[00:36.35]Heaven is a place not too far away
[00:39.34]
[00:40.42]We all know I should be the one to say we all make mistakes
[00:45.40]
[00:47.53]Take my hand and hold on
[00:49.90]Tell me everything that you need to say
[00:53.17]
[00:54.16]'Cause I know how it feels to be someone
[00:57.67]
[00:58.59]Feels to be someone who loses their way
[01:02.81]You're looking for answers in a place unknown
[01:06.28]

[01:48.02]

data.trans:
[ti:Hold On]
[ar:Justin Bieber]
[al:Hold On]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.64]//
[00:05.28]//
[00:07.93]若你需要有人给你安慰 你知道你可以找我
[00:11.48]
[00:14.71]若你陷入崩溃边缘 我会让你重新振作
[00:18.24]
[00:20.99]在你的天际画下繁星点点
[00:23.83]只因你希望自己能找回些理智
[00:27.72]
[00:28.38]若你需要有人陪伴 你知道你可以找我
[00:32.28]
[00:33.85]我要你能再坚定些
[00:36.35]天堂并非遥不可及
[00:39.34]
[00:40.42]众所周知 应该由我来说我们都会犯错
[00:45.40]
[00:47.53]牵住我的手 紧紧相牵
[00:49.90]告诉我你想说的一切
[00:53.17]
[00:54.16]只因我深刻明白那样的感受
[00:57.67]
[00:58.59]那种怅然迷惘的感受
[01:02.81]在未知的领域苦苦寻得一个答案
[01:06.28]
